New Records: KL Rahul scored 50 runs in 32 deliveries.
Virat Kohli scored 64 runs in 44 deliveries.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 30 runs in 16 deliveries.
Key Match Events: India won the match by 5 runs after Bangladesh failed to chase the target.
The match was interrupted by rain, leading to the use of the Duckworth-Lewis method.
Bangladesh lost key wickets after the resumption of play.
Pre-Game Insights: India set a target of 185 runs for Bangladesh to chase.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav expressed pride in the team's performance.
Players and experts complimented the team's character and bowling performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The revised target became 151 runs in 16 overs.
Bangladesh needed 85 runs in 9 overs after the rain interruption.
Others: Detailed scorecards and live updates of the match progression.
